import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./header.css"; function Header() { /*============== toggle menu=========== */ const[Toggle,showMenu] = useState(false); const [activeNav , setActiveNav] = useState("#home"); const myStyle = { color: '#2d48d0', }; return (
Shubham

  • setActiveNav("#about")} className={activeNav === "#About" ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link"}> About

  • setActiveNav("#portfolio")} className={activeNav === "#Portfolio" ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link"}> Portfolio

showMenu(!Toggle)}>

) } export default Header
